person.persName: Alexander Macklin Ferguson (Scott County, Kentucky, laborer and farmer)

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, laborer and farmer. Kentucky native. Son of John R. Ferguson. Laborer in Scott County in 1850. Household owned twenty-six enslaved persons in Scott County in 1850. Farmer in Scott County in 1860. Owned nine enslaved persons in Scott County in 1860. Household owned an additional forty enslaved persons in Scott County in 1860.
